entry.title: Crypto Working Group
entry.content:
The Crypto Working Group meets around four times a year to present work to each other. It is a collaboration between several Dutch universities.

When I make slides, I support my spoken text with pictures. The lack of text on the slides is suboptimal for publishing them, but it is better than nothing ðŸ˜‰. If you want to get a global idea of what the paper is about I would advise looking here.

entry.title: One Conference
entry.content:
The ONE Conference is Europeâ€™s prime cybersecurity event. A leading platform for sharing knowledge, best practices and research results.

Together with the Young Talents I pitched our project at the Main stage of the One Conference, and we had a presentation on the second day of the conference.

entry.title: ICT Open
entry.content:
NWO ICT.Open brings scientists from all ICT research disciplines and industries together to learn, share ideas, and network.

I was accepted for a poster session.

entry.title: Summer School on real-world crypto and privacy

link.title: Summer School on real-world crypto and privacy

entry.content: The Summer School on real-world crypto and privacy 2025 aimed at bringing together Master/PhD students, academics and security experts from industry. The Studentsâ€™ Session Talks were the talks given by participants who liked to give a little presentation.
